org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.rmic

Class XNewRmic

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.rmic.DefaultRmicAdapter
      • org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.rmic.ForkingSunRmic
        • org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.rmic.XNewRmic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RmicAdapter

    public class XNewRmic
extends ForkingSunRmic
    Run rmic in a new process with -Xnew set. This switches rmic to use a new compiler, one that doesn't work in-process on ant on java1.6. see: http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=38732
